YambeURLsplit.description: Fragment to split the URL with to find the page title, the part right of this fragment will be used. Usually either /w/index.php?title= or /wiki/.

YambeBCdelimiter.description: Character to separate the breadcrumb elements with.

YambeBCoverflowPrefix.description: Prefix to use if the maximum number of breadcrumb elements is exceeded.

YambeBCselfLink.description: If true, the breadcrumb element for the current page will be a link to it, otherwise it will be plain text.
